text: wfrraqna bani 'iisrayiyl fi al'ard jmaeat, minhum alqaymwn bihuquq allah wahuquq ebadh, waminhum almqssirwn alzaalimun lanfshm, wakhtbrna hwla' balrkha' fi aleaysh walssaeat fi alrzq, wakhtbrnahm aydana balshdt fi aleaysh walmsayb walrzaya; raja' 'ana yrjeu 'iilaa taeat rabihim wytwbu min measyh
